name: Raise test bar implementation
description: Implement CI quality gates, test runner setup, and UI smoke flow support for the raise-test-bar change.

userStories.title: Set up app test runner with coverage
userStories.description: As a maintainer, I want Jest + jest-expo configured for apps/mobile with coverage output.
acceptanceCriteria: Jest + jest-expo configuration exists for apps/mobile
apps/mobile test script runs Jest with coverage enabled

userStories.title: Add CI lint/test quality gates
userStories.description: As a maintainer, I want GitHub Actions to enforce lint/test on every PR.
acceptanceCriteria: GitHub Actions workflow runs on pull_request
Workflow runs pnpm lint and pnpm test

userStories.title: Gate build on app changes
userStories.description: As a maintainer, I want CI to run pnpm build only when app code changes.
acceptanceCriteria: CI runs pnpm build only when changes touch apps/**
Conditional build logic is documented in the workflow

userStories.title: Run Maestro smoke flows when present
userStories.description: As a maintainer, I want CI to run Maestro smoke flows for UI changes when flows exist.
acceptanceCriteria: CI detects Maestro flows in maestro/ or apps/**/maestro/
Maestro smoke flows run only when UI changes touch apps/** and flows exist
CI logs that Maestro flows are skipped when none exist
